h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Spine In the Sack Location
content: The Spine In The Sack Curios Item is located within The Webbed Hollow. It is randomly dropped by any of the spider cocoons in the area. Simply farm them within the hollow to find them
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Spine_In_the_Sack.md', within the main section titled 'Spine In the Sack', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Spine In the Sack Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Spine In The Sack Curios Item is located within The Webbed Hollow. It is randomly dropped by any of the spider cocoons in the area. Simply farm them within the hollow to find them
